LanguageData.TM_PomanaSenseHD.label: pomana sense
LanguageData.TM_PomanaSenseHD.description: Relaxation and heightened senses from consuming raw pomana fruit.
LanguageData.TM_SyrriumSenseHD.label: syrrium sense

LanguageData.TM_SyrriumTolerance.label: syrrium tolerance

LanguageData.TM_SyrriumAddiction.label: syrrium addiction

LanguageData.TM_SyrriumAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
